register.name: Name
register.pleaseContact: After registering your account, please contact us at {{email}} with proof so we can review your application and add you to our list of schools.

codes.401: Failed to make request to AutoScheduler service with permissions error.
codes.408: Could not connect to the AutoScheduler server.
codes.TIMEOUT: Could not connect to AutoScheduler service.
codes.USER_ALREADY_EXISTS: A user with that email address already exists.
codes.UNIVERSITY_ALREADY_EXISTS: A university with that name is already registered.
codes.INVALID_PASSWORD: Invalid password. Please make it longer and ensure it has a mix of numbers, uppercase and lowercase letters.
codes.INVALID_PARAMS: The form was not completed correctly. Please make sure all fields have been filled in.

errors.gettingUniversitiesData: There was an error fetching universities data.

email.maxLength: Your email address must not exceed 100 characters.
email.invalidEmail: Please introduce a valid email address.

password.requiredLength: Your password must contain at least 8 characters.
password.requiredCharacters: Your password must contain a mix of numbers and uppercase and lowercase letters.
password.maxLength: Your password must not exceed 100 characters.

name.requiredLength: Your school's name must contain at least 4 characters.
name.maxLength: Your school's name must not exceed 100 characters.

studentName.maxLength: Your name must not exceed 50 characters.

school.programNotSelected: Please select the school and program you are enrolled in.

login.recoverPasswordDescription: Type in your email address and we'll help you recover your account.
login.emailSent: An email has been sent to your inbox with instructions on what to do next. The message may take a while to deliver.
login.emailNotFound: The provided email address is not associated to any AutoScheduler account.

errors.externalLoginFailed: Failed to log you in automatically, please log in manually.
errors.badConnection: Could not connect. Check your internet connection and try again.

modal.areYouSureCourse: Are you sure you want to delete course '{{code}} - {{name}}'?

modal.areYouSureTerm: Are you sure you want to delete the term '{{code}} - {{name}}'?

modal.inputTextToSearch: Type a course's name or code to search for it.

results.pleaseWait: We're looking for schedules that best fit your needs! Please wait.

home.getVerified: Your school has not yet been verified. If you haven't started your application yet, remember to contact us at {{email}} with proof of your association with this school so we can verify the account and add your school to our list.

forms.selectProgram: Please select a program to view its requirements for this course.
